name: 3ASMARTLIFE
0:
”Alexa, turn on the lights”
”Alexa, turn off the lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
3A SMARTLIFE products help you control home appliance.You can simply ask Alexa to control your devices！

There’s no need to go to the switch to adjust your device - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo.
After connecting Alexa to your 3A SMARTLIFE products in a few simple steps:
1.Download “3A SMARTLIFE” App and register an account
2.Configure some devices on “3A SMARTLIFE” App
3.Download Amazon "Alexa" app and configure Echo with "Alexa" app
4.Search "3A SMARTLIFE" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category
5.Click Enable skill,and you will be navigated to login page
6.Input your “3A SMARTLIFE” App Account username and password, you'll be redirect to the success page
7.Now all setup is finished.
You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa,turn on the bedroom light.”
“Alexa,turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa,set the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa,brighten the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa,dim the bedroom light to 50%.”
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
"Alexa, set bedroom light to cool white."
